summary: Replaces the Bloodskal blade with a custom mesh and texture
descriptionHtml:
5/4/2015 Update

Didn't work the first time around for a lot of folks, sorry about that, hopefully this one works out, delete the original before adding this version. Don't hesitate to yell at me in the posts section if its still not working.Â 

Description:

Wasn't really happy with the original look of the Bloodskaal Blade, so I made a custom mesh and texture.

This Mod will replace the Original Bloodskaal Weapon with a new one.
author: Davis237
